elements.description:
The overlay element.

### Styling

See [`<vaadin-overlay>` documentation](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-overlay/blob/master/src/vaadin-overlay.html)
for `<vaadin-dialog-overlay>` parts.

properties.name: _last
properties.description: returns true if this is the last one in the opened overlays stack

properties.name: owner
properties.description: Owner element passed with renderer function

properties.name: renderer
properties.description:
Custom function for rendering the content of the overlay
NOTE: The renderer callback can be called several times with previous content available

properties.name: template
properties.description: The template of the overlay content.

properties.name: content
properties.description: References the content container after the template is stamped.

properties.name: model
properties.description: Object with properties that is passed to `renderer` function

properties.name: modeless
properties.description:
When true the overlay won't disable the main content, showing
it doesn’t change the functionality of the user interface.

properties.name: focusTrap
properties.description:
When true move focus to the first focusable element in the overlay,
or to the overlay if there are no focusable elements.

methods.name: _outsideClickListener
methods.description:
We need to listen on 'click' / 'tap' event and capture it and close the overlay before
propagating the event to the listener in the button. Otherwise, if the clicked button would call
open(), this would happen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z86V_ICUCD4

elements.name: Vaadin.DialogOverlayElement

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: Owner element passed with renderer function

attributes.name: renderer
attributes.description:
Custom function for rendering the content of the overlay
NOTE: The renderer callback can be called several times with previous content available

attributes.name: template
attributes.description: The template of the overlay content.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: References the content container after the template is stamped.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Object with properties that is passed to `renderer` function

attributes.name: modeless
attributes.description:
When true the overlay won't disable the main content, showing
it doesn’t change the functionality of the user interface.

attributes.name: focus-trap
attributes.description:
When true move focus to the first focusable element in the overlay,
or to the overlay if there are no focusable elements.

events.name: vaadin-overlay-close
events.description:
vaadin-overlay-close
fired before the `vaadin-overlay` will be closed. If canceled the closing of the overlay is canceled as well.

events.name: vaadin-overlay-escape-press
events.description:
vaadin-overlay-escape-press
fired before the `vaadin-overlay` will be closed on ESC button press. If canceled the closing of the overlay is canceled as well.

events.name: vaadin-overlay-open
events.description:
vaadin-overlay-open
fired after the `vaadin-overlay` is opened.

events.name: vaadin-overlay-outside-click
events.description:
We need to listen on 'click' / 'tap' event and capture it and close the overlay before
propagating the event to the listener in the button. Otherwise, if the clicked button would call
open(), this would happen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z86V_ICUCD4

elements.description:
`<vaadin-dialog>` is a Polymer 2 element for customized modal dialogs.

```html
<vaadin-dialog opened>
  <template>
    Sample dialog
  </template>
</vaadin-dialog>
```

### Styling

See [`<vaadin-overlay>` documentation](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-overlay/blob/master/src/vaadin-overlay.html)
for `<vaadin-dialog-overlay>` parts.

See [ThemableMixin – how to apply styles for shadow parts](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-themable-mixin/wiki)

properties.name: opened
properties.description: True if the overlay is currently displayed.

properties.name: noCloseOnOutsideClick
properties.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on outside click

properties.name: noCloseOnEsc
properties.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on Escape press

properties.name: renderer
properties.description: Custom function for rendering the content of the overlay

methods.name: _handleOutsideClick
methods.description: Close the dialog if `noCloseOnOutsideClick` isn't set to true

methods.name: _handleEscPress
methods.description: Close the dialog if `noCloseOnEsc` isn't set to true

elements.name: Vaadin.DialogElement

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: True if the overlay is currently displayed.

attributes.name: no-close-on-outside-click
attributes.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on outside click

attributes.name: no-close-on-esc
attributes.description: Set to true to disable closing dialog on Escape press

attributes.name: renderer
attributes.description: Custom function for rendering the content of the overlay
